short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension that enhances article readability by highlighting key phrases

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of feeling overwhelmed by the sheer amount of text on a webpage? Do you struggle to focus on the most important information in an article? Look no further than Readly (Read+Easily), a revolutionary Chrome extension that uses artificial intelligence to highlight key phrases and make reading a breeze.

Two ways to interact with Readly:
1. You can select the text, right-click, and choose the "highlight key phrases" option to let Readly highlight the key phrases in your selected text.

2. Turn on Readly extension, and it will automatically read the web content and highlight all the key phrases.

How it Works?
Our extension uses advanced natural language processing (NLP) algorithms to analyze the content of a webpage and identify the most important phrases among a paragraph. The words are highlighted in yellow, allowing you to quickly grasp the main ideas and takeaways from an article.

Benefits
With Readly, you'll enjoy a more efficient and enjoyable reading experience. Our extension helps you:

Focus on the most important information: By highlighting key phrases, you'll be able to quickly identify the main points of an article and skip over unnecessary details.
Improve comprehension: By breaking down complex articles into easily digestible chunks, our extension helps you understand and retain more information.
Enhance your online reading experience: Whether you're a student, researcher, or simply a curious reader, Readly is the perfect tool to help you get the most out of your online reading.
